course_description: This course is intended to prepare SRNAs for the National Certification Exam. Each of the four content areas of the NCE will be covered, including Basic Sciences; Equipment, Instrumentation and Technology; General Principles of Anesthesia; Anesthesia for Surgical Procedures and Special Populations.
prerequisites: NRSG 690 as prerequisite and NRSG 691 as co-requisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 1457, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 8a-3:30p, Instructor: K. Cole, Status: Open
